name: Sentient Piss Bag 3D #2 | Five Shits at Nathan's
name_original: Sentient Piss Bag 3D #2 | Five Shits at Nathan's
description:
The Game

Sentient Piss Bag 3D 2 | 5 Shits at Nathan's is a parody horror game based on the Five Night's at Freddy's series originally created by Scott Cawthon. The game features characters from my web series Sentient Piss Bag and was created to celebrate the third installment of the series.

Note

While the game's theme is a good ol' joke I did put serious effort into it and would appreciate any feedback negative or positive as it is my first actually complete project. All I ask is that when providing negative feedback it be constructive and not just "lol bad game". Thank you for playing, I hope you have an amazing day.

Bug Reporting

If you find any bugs please report them in the comment section below. I will get to work on fixing them as soon as I see them. Thank you.
